title: Randoms: Watch Video of Van Aert Testing Cobblestone Game-Changer; Ganna Blasts Remco’s Strava Segments
content:
Van Aert trials radical Gravaa tire pressure regulator ahead of Paris-Roubaix, Ganna stomps over the segments of Spain as he steams toward San Remo.

Read the full article at Randoms: Watch Video of Van Aert Testing Cobblestone Game-Changer; Ganna Blasts Remco’s Strava Segments on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
